response.job_title: Ingeniero Electricista - Universidad Nacional de Colombia
response.summary:
Ingeniero Electricista - Universidad Nacional de Colombia

Soy una persona responsable, respetuosa y con ganas de aprender de cada una de las labores que realizo.

Interesado en temas de sistemas de potencia, iluminación y fuentes renovables de energía.

Manejo avanzado de Softwares: Office, DiaLux y AutoCAD.

Actualmente estudiante el manejo de Revit, Navisworks y Civil 3D.
response.skills: Italiano como lengua extranjera., Trabajo en equipo, Resolución de problemas, Seguridad, Comunicazione

profile_positions.description:
Experiencia en el ámbito de las licitaciones, como lo es la factibilidad económica, formación de presupuestos y posterior entrega de ofertas.

Experiencia en presupuestos de sistemas solares fotovoltaicos, instalaciones eléctricas residenciales y subestaciones.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniero Electricista Junior Departamento de Licitaciones

profile_positions.description: Estudiante Auxiliar del Diplomado Retilap e iluminación de la Universidad Nacional de Colombia.
profile_positions.title: Estudiante auxiliar

education.grade: ÉNFASIS EN ILUMINACIÓN INTERIOR, ALUMBRADO PÚBLICO E ILUMINACIÓN DEPORTIVA

company.name: BCPGroup Artificial Lift, Inc.
company.description:
BCPGroup Artificial Lift Inc. was created in 2015 as the newest company of the BCP Holding and is currently located in Houston, TX. With full manufacture, technology testing, and training capabilities, this Houston facility will represent the North American Headquarters for the company, and will attend to the entire United States, Canada, and Mexico market needs for Artificial Lift solutions and automation. 

BCPGroup is the leader in artificial lift controllers and solutions with our flagship CILA2S 4G controller developed over the last 15 years with Rockwell Automation drives and features currently not available in other controllers and over 4,000 installed in multiple countries.

BCPGroup is also extremely experienced in PCP's with over 8,000 successfully installed downhole and a great number of surface PCP's in our unique Compact-MultiPhase Pumping solution.

Contact us to find out more about the most innovative technical and artificial lift solutions in the industry.
